enWisdom: Modesty is the key to (every) good
Modesty prevents one from ugly actions

Wisdom: الْحَيَاءُ مِنَ اللَّهِ يَمْحُو كَثِيراً مِنَ الْخَطَايَا
enWisdom: Being ashamed in front of Allah effaces many of the sins [that one has committed]

Wisdom: الْحَيَاءُ مِنَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ وَتَعَالَى تَقِي [يقي من‏] عَذَابَ النَّارِ
enWisdom: Being ashamed in front of Allah, the Glorified, protects [one] from the punishment of hell
The fruit of modesty is chastity

Wisdom: مَنْ كَسَاهُ الْحَيَاءُ ثَوْبَهُ خَفِيَ عَنِ النَّاسِ عَيْبُهُ
enWisdom: Whoever is clothed with the garment of modesty, his faults are hidden from the people

Wisdom: مَنْ صَحِبَهُ الْحَيَاءُ فِي قَوْلِهِ زَايَلَهُ الْخَنَى فِي فِعْلِهِ
enWisdom: One whose speech is accompanied by modesty, corruption [and destruction] is removed from his action
